review: My overall experience was seamless , very comfortable and I was able to ask questions about my treatment with the assurance that I can contact Dr Pranav at any time if needed. I highly recommend Dr. Pranav for anyone who is considering to go for Invisalign clear braces.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pranav explains each and every step of the procedure apart from making the patient comfortable with his friendliness.  He is a fine doctor who's very particular about his work. Currently I am consulting him for my daughter's braces and am thoroughly satisfied with his treatment.

review: I have been going to Dr. Bobby's clinic for the past 20 years. Dr. Pranav took time to explain the procedure, what results i could expect from it, the precautions post procedure i neex to take and the whole experience was extremely satisfactory!
